commands.name: az iot ops dataflow profile list
commands.summary: List dataflow profiles associated with an instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops dataflow profile list --instance
                                 --resource-group
examples: az iot ops dataflow profile list --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops dataflow profile show
commands.summary: Show details of a dataflow profile.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops dataflow profile show --instance
                                 --name
                                 --resource-group
examples: az iot ops dataflow profile show -n myprofile --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
